pages.title: Catching Mobs
pages.text: 一些小型生物可以通过多种方法捕捉。$(br)节肢动物可以用空瓶捕捉。$(br)水中的生物可以用桶捞起来。$(br)Sessile mobs can be dug up with a Shovel$(br)Other Critters can be picked up by hand.

pages.title: Cage Trap
pages.text: The Cage Trap is the ultimate solution to mob catching problems. Any mob touching an open Cage Trap will be captured inside. $(br2)Mobs inside a Cage Trap can be released by activating the Trap (with a right-click, or trough Redstone).
